013package org.apache.juneau.utils;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.IOUtils.UTF8;
016import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.IOUtils.read;
017
018import java.io.ByteArrayInputStream;
019import java.io.File;
020import java.io.FileInputStream;
021import java.io.IOException;
022import java.io.InputStream;
023import java.io.Reader;
024import java.net.MalformedURLException;
025import java.net.URL;
026import java.nio.file.Files;
027import java.nio.file.Path;
028import java.util.jar.Manifest;
029
030import org.apache.juneau.collections.JsonMap;
031import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.ThrowableUtils;
032
033/**
034 * Utility class for working with Jar manifest files.
035 *
036 * <p>
037 * Copies the contents of a {@link Manifest} into an {@link JsonMap} so that the various convenience methods on that
038 * class can be used to retrieve values.
039 *
040 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
041
042 * </ul>
043 *
044 * @serial exclude
045 */
046public class ManifestFile extends JsonMap {
047
048   private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
049
050    /**
051     * Create an instance of this class from a manifest file on the file system.
052     *
053     * @param f The manifest file.
054     * @throws IOException If a problem occurred while trying to read the manifest file.
055     */
056    public ManifestFile(File f) throws IOException {
057        Manifest mf = new Manifest();
058        try (FileInputStream fis = new FileInputStream(f)) {
059            mf.read(fis);
060            load(mf);
061        } catch (IOException e) {
062            throw new IOException("Problem detected in MANIFEST.MF.  Contents below:\n"+read(f), e);
063        }
064    }
065
066    /**
067     * Create an instance of this class from a manifest path on the file system.
068     *
069     * @param path The manifest path.
070     * @throws IOException If a problem occurred while trying to read the manifest path.
071     */
072    public ManifestFile(Path path) throws IOException {
073        Manifest mf = new Manifest();
074        try (InputStream fis = Files.newInputStream(path)) {
075            mf.read(fis);
076            load(mf);
077        } catch (IOException e) {
078            throw new IOException("Problem detected in MANIFEST.MF.  Contents below:\n"+read(path), e);
079        }
080    }
081
082   /**
083    * Create an instance of this class from a {@link Manifest} object.
084    *
085    * @param f The manifest to read from.
086    */
087   public ManifestFile(Manifest f) {
088      load(f);
089   }
090
091   /**
092    * Finds and loads the manifest file of the jar file that the specified class is contained within.
093    *
094    * @param c The class to get the manifest file of.
095    * @throws IOException If a problem occurred while trying to read the manifest file.
096    */
097   public ManifestFile(Class<?> c) throws IOException {
098      String className = c.getSimpleName() + ".class";
099      String classPath = c.getResource(className).toString();
100      if (! classPath.startsWith("jar")) {
101         return;
102      }
103      String manifestPath = classPath.substring(0, classPath.lastIndexOf("!") + 1) +  "/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF";
104      try {
105         Manifest mf = new Manifest(new URL(manifestPath).openStream());
106         load(mf);
107      } catch (MalformedURLException e) {
108         throw ThrowableUtils.cast(IOException.class, e);
109      } catch (IOException e) {
110         e.printStackTrace();
111      }
112   }
113
114   /**
115    * Create an instance of this class loaded from the contents of a reader.
116    *
117    * <p>
118    * Note that the input must end in a newline to pick up the last line!
119    *
120    * @param r The manifest file contents.
121    * @throws IOException If a problem occurred while trying to read the manifest file.
122    */
123   public ManifestFile(Reader r) throws IOException {
124      load(new Manifest(new ByteArrayInputStream(read(r).getBytes(UTF8))));
125   }
126
127   /**
128    * Create an instance of this class loaded from the contents of an input stream.
129    *
130    * <p>
131    * Note that the input must end in a newline to pick up the last line!
132    *
133    * @param is The manifest file contents.
134    * @throws IOException If a problem occurred while trying to read the manifest file.
135    */
136   public ManifestFile(InputStream is) throws IOException {
137      load(new Manifest(is));
138   }
139
140   private void load(Manifest mf) {
141      mf.getMainAttributes().forEach((k,v) -> put(k.toString(), v.toString()));
142   }
143
144   @Override /* Object */
145   public String toString() {
146      StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
147      forEach((k,v) -> sb.append(k).append(": ").append(v));
148      return sb.toString();
149   }
150}
